author: Lao Tzu
message: Anticipate the difficult by managing the easy.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
title: Thought of the day

author: Sophocles
message: A short saying often contains much wisdom.
title: Thought of the day

message: It takes both sunshine and rain to make a rainbow.
title: Thought of the day
